english: The falls upstream are full of salmon .
chinese: 该瀑布上流有许多大麻哈鱼。

english: He is liked by the classes and the masses .
chinese: 上流人士和普通民众都喜欢他。

english: Mind that your children do n't catch the flu ..
chinese: 小心别让你孩子传上流感。

english: The blood ran down his cheek a little way .
chinese: 血从他的腮帮子上流下来一点。

english: I do not care what the world thinks .
chinese: 我不在乎上流社会怎样看。
上流造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: She is moving in fashionable circles in new york ..
chinese: 她活动于纽约上流社会之中。

english: Harris was not the upper classes .
chinese: 哈里斯不属于上流社会。

english: Huxey was silenced by the company of "swells" .
chinese: 赫克斯在“上流人士”面前不声不响。

english: A ferocious grin lit his face .
chinese: 他脸上流露出一丝狞笑。
她脸上流露出惊慌的神色。

english: All the french noble ladies voted her charming .
chinese: 所有的法国上流妇女一致称赞她可爱。

english: She was taken up by swelldom .
He trembled, a sweat or dew ran off his face .
chinese: 他发抖，一阵汗或者汗珠从他脸上流下来。

english: He had the appearance of an extraordinary fine gentleman .
chinese: 他具有极上流的绅士的风采。

english: He was pleased by the response he read in my face .
chinese: 我脸上流露出来的表情使他感到欢欣。
